headline.main: Indecision Seen in Hitler's Delays; Plans on Vichy, Spain Held Awry; Nazi Advantage Gained in Rumania Not Yet Followed Up -- Petain and Franco Viewed as Resisting the Demands of Berlin

lead_paragraph: In their various speeches and messages on New Year's Eve Reichsfuehrer Hitler and his lieutenants boasted that final victory was within their grasp, that the British Isles and the British Empire would crumble at their own selected moment.
abstract: Articles on: German delays and indecision
snippet: In their various speeches and messages on New Year's Eve Reichsfuehrer Hitler and his lieutenants boasted that final victory was within their grasp, that the British Isles and the British Empire would crumble at their own selected moment....
